name: Defender Faith
description:
Defender Faith is an atmospheric hardcore 2d platformer shooter. Pixel art is made in black white tones.
A long time ago, a hero of legends sealed the Lord of Demons in the abyss. But the time has come and the demons of the Abyss have invaded our world again.
Your hero is a demon hunter who craves to destroy all the demons in his path.

Game features:
  • Atmosphere.
  • Hardcore.
  • Boss fights.
  • Pixel art made in black white.
  • Cat boss :3
